data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 25,694 believers in the county of Rampur to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Rampur, Uttar Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, guide the 25,694 believers in the county of Rampur into all truth as they interpret Scriptures.
data.verse: For the word of God is alive and active. Sharper than any double-edged sword, it penetrates even to dividing soul and spirit, joints and marrow;

data.prayer: Father, we pray that the county of Rampur be filled with simple churches in every neighborhood.
data.verse: For the earth will be full of the knowledge of the Lord, as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 25,694 believers living in the county of Rampur. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Sayyid Husaini people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Sayyid Husaini people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Sayyid Husaini people is yours.
Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Rampur, Uttar Pradesh, India that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 2,310,106 lost in Rampur that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Rampur with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

location.name: Rampur
location.people_groups_list: Soligaru, Jat Thakurela, Rajput Jaiswal, Karwal, Julaha
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Soligaru (34,000), Jat Thakurela (127,000), Rajput Jaiswal (21,000), Karwal (8,000), Julaha (820,000)
